text:
Find the rule of for a sum of a series

\begin{array}{l}\n{\left[2\left(\frac{1}{8}\right)+3\right]+\left[2\left(\frac{2}{8}\right)+3\right]} \\\n+\ldots \ldots+\left[2\left(\frac{8}{8}\right)+3\right]\n\end{array}[imath]{\left[2\left(\frac{1}{8}\right)+3\right]+\left[2\left(\frac{2}{8}\right)+3\right]} [/imath] [imath]+\ldots \ldots+\left[2\left(\frac{8}{8}\right)+3\right][/imath]
